# Modifiers, Environment & Size Reference

> Environmental penalties, cover, barriers, speed, and the Size/Silhouette system.

---

## Lighting

| Penalty | Condition |
|---------|-----------|
| −2 | **Dim** (twilight, full moon, light fog) |
| −4 | **Dark** (moonless starry night, emergency lights, visible to 10") |
| −6 | **Pitch Black** (no visibility, invisibility) |

---

## Cover

| Penalty | Level |
|---------|-------|
| −2 | **Light** (~1/4 hidden) |
| −4 | **Medium** (~1/2 hidden, or prone) |
| −6 | **Heavy** (~3/4 hidden) |
| −8 | **Near Total** (barely visible, narrow slit) |

---

## Barrier Armor Values (when shot through)

| Armor | Material |
|-------|----------|
| +2 | Thick glass, leather, wooden partition, aluminum car door |
| +4 | Sheet metal, steel car door |
| +6 | Oak door, concrete wall |
| +8 | Brick wall |
| +10 | Stone wall, bulletproof glass, tree |

---

## Unstable Platform

−2 to ranged attacks from horseback, moving vehicle, etc.

---

## Speed Penalties (Relative Target Speed)

| Penalty | Speed |
|---------|-------|
| −1 | 95+ km/h |
| −2 | 195+ km/h |
| −4 | 385+ km/h |
| −6 | Mach 1+ |
| −8 | Mach 2+ |
| −10 | Near light speed |

---

## Size & Silhouette System

### Size Range
From **−6** (Tiny) to **+20** (legendary colossal). Size directly **adds to Toughness**.

### Silhouette Categories

| Modifier | Silhouette | Examples |
|----------|-----------|----------|
| −6 | Tiny (Крошечный) | Fairy, mouse, ball, armor slit |
| −4 | Very Small (Очень мелкий) | Cat, eagle, human head, basketball |
| −2 | Small (Мелкий) | Dog, child, human limb |
| 0 | Normal (Средний) | Human, elf, motorcycle, bull |
| +2 | Large (Крупный) | Horse, ogre, hippopotamus, car |
| +4 | Huge (Огромный) | Elephant, dragon, whale |
| +6+ | Gargantuan (Гигантский) | Building, kaiju, ship |

### Size Combat Effects
1. **Toughness**: Size modifier adds directly to Toughness
2. **Attack modifier**: Smaller attacker **adds** silhouette difference to attack roll; larger attacker **subtracts** it
3. **Bonus Wounds**: Large (+2)=+1 wound (max 4), Huge (+4)=+2 (max 5), Gargantuan (+6+)=+3 (max 6)
4. **Melee Reach**: Bonus reach equals bonus wounds (Large=+1", Huge=+2", Gargantuan=+3")

### Called Shots vs Sized Targets
Use the body part's own silhouette category, not the creature's overall size. A car-sized eye on a kaiju = +2 modifier (Large target).
